user_query: I am planning a picnic with my friends and I need some portable and picnic-friendly recipes. Can you suggest some delicious recipes that are easy to pack and carry? Also, provide me with some tips and reviews from people who have tried these recipes.

TaskList.description: Search for portable and picnic-friendly recipes.
Gather tips for packing and carrying the recipes.
Collect reviews from people who have tried the suggested recipes.
